name: HostUCan
overview:
HostUCan.com is a leading global web hosting search and review platform. Our innovative Needs Oriented Product Search Engine enables people to find the best web hosting solutions based on the type of web sites they plan to build.

In HostUCan, you will only see the reviews from TRUE web hosting customers. We audit each review manually before publishing it to avoid spam.

HostUcan also develop a serials tool to analyze the customer reviews and generate useful information to help our visitors to know the strength of a web host, which include:

  • Customer types distribution and the relevant satisfaction
  • Average Scores on each review dimensions
  • Best hosting models of each web hosting package
  • etc.
